name: ProjectInformation
0:
”Alexa, Start Project Information”
”What is the status of the closed task for month end”
”Okay which country would have the most critical and pending tasks”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: project information
des:
Info : Conversation related to project's pending tasks update and following up on the same. 
Prerequisites: There is no prerequisites
For starting the skill : Start Project Information

The skill has the basic conversation related to the pending items of a project and also discussion about setting up the follow up calls and meetings .You can first start the Project Information skill.

"Alexa, start Project Information" . 
Ask basic questions like "what is the status of the closed task for the month end?" or "Okay which country would have the most critical and pending tasks" or "I think I would like to focus on the overdue and critical tasks for now" or "Okay set up a follow up call with the defaulters".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
